title: Absolute Power: The Legacy of Corruption in the Clinton-Reno Justice Department
description: "David is an incredibly gifted researcher and writer. He has been able to do what the mainstream media has been unwilling and unable to do, which is to chronicle the unprecedented and dangerous corruption in the Justice Department and expose how politics has been used to protect the Clintons. This is a must-read for anybody who wants to restore honor, dignity, and integrity to our justice system."-Sean Hannity, Fox News
author: David Limbaugh
